message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.NE 

The paper discusses a method that combines information retrieval techniques with deep learning models for natural language inference to improve question answering. This suggests that the paper could belong to several arXiv CS sub-categories, including cs.CL (Computation and Language), cs.IR (Information Retrieval), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.LG (Machine Learning), and cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing). Among these, cs.CL is the most likely category as it specifically deals with natural language processing, followed by cs.IR which deals with information retrieval. The other categories are also relevant as they involve machine learning and artificial intelligence techniques, which are used in the proposed method.
